title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 14)
description: Henry carries the flag in a new charge that dislodges enemy soldiers holding a fenceline. Private Wilson wrenches the enemy flag from a mortally wounded Confederate standard-bearer. As the larger battle winds down, the regiment marches back across the river and Henry reflects upon how the experience of battle has changed him.
